name: That Weird Dream
description:
This game was made originally for Godot wild jam, Theme was "merge". I decided to make it about merging in the environment. If you have any suggestions/bugs comment down below! Also say what aspect did you like in the game!
Also thanks to 0x72 for making beautiful characters in pixel art check him out:
https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
